snippet: For two weeks, the family of Marie Salatino did not know where she had been taken or if she was even alive.
abstract: Family of 93-year-old Marie Salatino finds her at a nursing home in Brooklyn two weeks after she was evacuated from a beachside nursing home in Rockaway Park, Queens without any information about her location or condition.

byline.contributor: Michael Powell and Jennifer Preston contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: For two weeks, the family of Marie Salatino did not know where she had been taken or if she was even alive.

headline.seo: Evacuated in Hurricane, Woman, 93, Reunites With Family
headline.main: Evacuated in Hurricane, Woman, 93, Reunites With Family After 2 Weeks
headline.print_headline: Evacuated in Hurricane, Woman, 93, Reunites With Family After 2 Weeks

keywords.value: Promenade Rehabilitation and Health Care Center (Queens, NY)
